name: Fat-Astic Feast
description:
One food is never enough, that's why everyone always wants more! Fat-astic feast challenges you to make everyone happy by serving a lot of foods. Open your food truck, swipe and merge the same food to discover new menu, bring the food to the kitchen then serve it to your hungry customers.

Your job doesn't stop there! Merge your way to different type of foods and level 'em up until your customers get curvier by having a happy tummy. Don't forget to bring the better service by upgrading your waiters, chef, recipes, and... calories. LOL.

What are you waiting for? Let's share happiness through food and be Fat-astically happy!

Let us know your thought or your favorite recipes via info@alegrium.com
